metadata.Title: CVE-2005-1513 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the stralloc_readyplus function in qmail, when runningon 64 bit platforms with a large amount of virtual memory, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary codevia a large SMTP request.

criterions.comment: netqmail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
